segments.text: Oh . Have you finished listing your study preferences ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . So , which is your top choice ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Medicine . In my country , that certainly has great prestige .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Which subject did you put last then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's interesting . Could you give any reasons for your choice ? Can you explainwhy do you put medicine first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , doctors are such an important job . I mean your health is the most imponent thing you've got , isn't it ? I want to be important and help people .
segments.speaker: S2
